00031 class RealMatrix2 {
00032 private:
00033 
00034     Vector * data_;
00035     int row_, col_;
00036 
00037     class RangeViolation : public exception {
00038     };
00039 
00040 public:
00041 
00042     RealMatrix2(int, int);
00043     RealMatrix2(int);
00044 
00045     virtual ~RealMatrix2();
00046     RealMatrix2();
00047     RealMatrix2(const RealMatrix2 &);
00048 
00049     void range_check(int i, int j) const;
00050     
00051 
00052     void resize(int row, int col);
00053 
00054     double operator ()(int i, int j) const;
00055 
00056     void operator ()(int i, int j, double value);
00057 
00058     RealMatrix2 & operator-(const RealMatrix2 &);
00059 
00060     void mul(const RealMatrix2 &)const;
00061 
00062     void fillEigenData(int stateSpaceDim, RealMatrix2 & df, double & eigenValR, double & eigenValI, RealVector & eigenVec);
00063 
00064     void scale(double t);
00065     
00066     friend std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream& , const RealMatrix2& );
00067     
00068     
00069     RealMatrix2 & zero();
00070 
00071     int row()const;
00072

00074

00076 
00077 inline void RealMatrix2::resize(int row,int col){
00078     row_=row;
00079     col_=col;
00080     data_->resize(row*col);
00081 }
00082 
00083 inline void RealMatrix2::range_check(int i, int j) const {
00084     if (((i < 0) && (i > row_)) || ((j < 0) && (j > col_)))
00085         THROW(RealMatrix2::RangeViolation());
00086 }
00087 
00088 inline double RealMatrix2::operator()(int i, int j) const {
00089     range_check(i, j);
00090     return data_->component(i * row_ + j);
00091 
00092 }
00093 
00094 inline RealMatrix2 & RealMatrix2::operator-(const RealMatrix2 & b) {
00095     for (int i = 0; i < row_; i++) {
00096         for (int j = 0; j < col_; j++) {
00097             operator()(i, j, operator()(i, j) - b(i, j));
00098         }
00099     }
00100     return *this;
00101 
00102 }
00103 
00104 inline RealMatrix2 & RealMatrix2::zero(void) {
00105     data_->zero();
00106     return *this;
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 
00111 inline void RealMatrix2::operator ()(int i, int j, double value) {
00112     range_check(i, j);
00113     data_->component(i * row_ + j) = value;
00114 
00115 }
00116 
00117 inline int RealMatrix2::row()const {
00118     return row_;
00119 }
00120 
00121 inline int RealMatrix2::col()const {
00122     return col_;
00123 }
00124 
00125 inline void RealMatrix2::scale(double t) {
00126 
00127     for (int i = 0; i < row_; i++) {
00128         for (int j = 0; j < col_; j++) {
00129             data_->component(i * row_ + j) = data_->component(i * row_ + j) * t;
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00133 }
